_sText:
Well, this is my first time using alot of the funcs and logics. There is a total of  11 useable traps and one automatic trap.
----------------------------------------------------------
Three Terrorist Spawn Points
Twenty Counter-Terrorist Spawn Points
----------------------------------------------------------
Spawncampers die after 45 seconds
Glass breaks every 10 seconds after that
----------------------------------------------------------
Try to have fun, and give comments with suggestions for future projects.
----------------------------------------------------------
It was a bad idea to put the ts round the outside, so i put a speeboost in.
----------------------------------------------------------

Version 2: Fixed some traps, made them move more to stop people passing them.


Version 3: Fixed bug wher eyou can skip past traps and bug under middle structure




Thnx to Element for showing me how to use point_server command thingy. xD
